scripts.android-linux: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
scripts.android-dev: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && react-native run-android

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/SkiUt.xcodeproj -scheme SkiUt -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7
